name: Bit by Gift
description:
A YOGSCAST Game Jam 2019 Entry. Made in 48 hours.

A game by ForkyTheEditor, Huskyez and StormLaw.

Music by Adrian von Ziegler: https://www.youtube.com/user/AdrianvonZiegler

Rover is a cold robot with no feelings. Charlie is a dog that can not move out of unknown causes.  They meet in the most unlikeliest of places and begin their journey together.

Will Rover be able to help Charlie get back home?

====READ THE CONTROLS BEFORE PLAYING!====

CONTROLS:

A, D - Move Rover

W - Rover jump

R - Pick up / Drop Charlie

LeftArrow, RightArrow - Move Charlie

UpArrow - Charlie Jump

F - Give Charlie a robot hand (for him to be able to interact with objects)

G - Give Charlie a robot leg (for him to be able to move)

E - Interact (for both Rover and Charlie)

Both characters need a leg to move and jump and a hand to climb ladders!

Get both characters to their respective doors to finish the level!
